snippet: In a proposal Tuesday, the N.H.L. Players' Association asked for a broadened revenue-sharing program designed to help clubs in financial trouble, a departure from the less extensive plan of the past.
abstract: In a proposal Tuesday, the N.H.L. Players' Association asked for a broadened revenue-sharing program designed to help clubs in financial trouble, a departure from the less extensive plan of the past.

headline.main: How to Share the Revenue Could Be Stumbling Block in N.H.L. Negotiations
